commands.name: az azurestackhci virtualmachine extension create
commands.syntax:
az azurestackhci virtualmachine extension create --name
                                                 --resource-group
                                                 --virtualmachine-name
                                                 [--auto-upgrade-minor {false, true}]
                                                 [--enable-auto-upgrade {false, true}]
                                                 [--extension-type]
                                                 [--force-update-tag]
                                                 [--inst-handler-version]
                                                 [--instance-view-type]
                                                 [--location]
                                                 [--protected-settings]
                                                 [--publisher]
                                                 [--settings]
                                                 [--status]
                                                 [--tags]
                                                 [--type-handler-version]
examples: az azurestackhci virtualmachine extension create --resource-group "test-rg" --location "West US2" --name "test-extension" --extension-type "CustomScriptExtension" --publisher "Microsoft.Compute" --settings '{"commandToExecute":"hostname"}' --type-handler-version "1.10" --virtualmachine-name "test-virtualmachine"

commands.name: az azurestackhci virtualmachine extension list
commands.summary: List all the extensions for a virtualmachine.

commands.name: az azurestackhci virtualmachine extension show
commands.summary: Get the details of a virtualmachine extension.

commands.name: az azurestackhci virtualmachine extension update
commands.syntax:
az azurestackhci virtualmachine extension update --name
                                                 [--auto-upgrade-minor {false, true}]
                                                 [--enable-auto-upgrade {false, true}]
                                                 [--extension-type]
                                                 [--force-update-tag]
                                                 [--ids]
                                                 [--protected-settings]
                                                 [--publisher]
                                                 [--resource-group]
                                                 [--settings]
                                                 [--subscription]
                                                 [--tags]
                                                 [--type-handler-version]
                                                 [--virtualmachine-name]

commands.name: az azurestackhci virtualmachine extension wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition of the virtualmachine extension is met.
